entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
